variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: ROS1
variable.description: Have you ever had any pain or discomfort in your chest?

variable.name: ROS2
variable.description: Do you get it when you walk uphill or in a hurry?

variable.name: ROS3
variable.description: Do you get it when you walk at ordinary pace on the level?

variable.name: ROS4
variable.description: What do you do if you get it while you are walking?

variable.name: ROS5
variable.description: If you stand still, what happens to it?

variable.name: ROS6
variable.description: (What happens to the chest pain if you stand still) How soon?

variable.name: ROS7A
variable.description: Will you show me where it was? Sternum (upper or middle)

variable.name: ROS7B
variable.description: Will you show me where it was? Sternum (lower)

variable.name: ROS7C
variable.description: Will you show me where it was? Left anterior chest

variable.name: ROS7D
variable.description: Will you show me where it was? Left arm

variable.name: ROS7E
variable.description: Will you show me where it was? Other

variable.name: ROS7F
variable.description: Specify (up to 16 characters)

variable.name: ROS8
variable.description: How long ago did you start getting this pain?

variable.name: ROS9
variable.description: Within the past 2 months, has your chest discomfort occurred more often?

variable.name: ROS10
variable.description: Has it occurred at least twice as often as before?

variable.name: ROS11
variable.description: Within the past two months, has the pain become more severe?

variable.name: ROS12
variable.description: Within the past two months, has the pain lasted longer when it occurs?

variable.name: ROS13
variable.description: Do you ever use nitroglycerin to relieve the pain?

variable.name: ROS14
variable.description: Within the past two months, has the pain required more nitroglycerin to relieve it?

variable.name: ROS15
variable.description: Within the past two months, have you started getting the pain with less exertion?

variable.name: ROS16
variable.description: Within the past two months, have you started getting the pain while either standing still or at rest?

variable.name: ROS17
variable.description: Within the past two months, have you started getting the pain while sleeping?

variable.name: ROS19
variable.description: Code number of person conducting the interview

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: ROS18FUT
variable.description: Date questionnaire administered

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
